name: Doodle Wars (Indivisible Particles)
description:
Doodle Wars is a top-down shooter game. You control a doodle trying to survive in the inhospitable world of doodles. You level up your character by destroying other doodles, for obtained levels you can buy some upgrades. This game offers no satisfactory ending, just endless shooting with no deeper meaning. 

Controls:

Use WASD/arrows to move

Aim with your mouse

Hold left mouse button to shoot
